caption.p: 1H NMR spectra of three Zanthoxylum species— Z. bungeanum (a, c), Z. schinifolium (d, e), and Z. piperitum (f, g)—and the structure of xanthoxylin (b). The 1H NMR spectra corresponding to the signals of 4-OCH 3 and 6-OCH 3 in (a), (d), and (f) were magnified to (c), (e), and (g), respectively.
